File_Description: Data package level readme. Contains data package summary; acknowledgements; and contact information.
This file contains information about USGS sampling site locations and d50 measurements.
Standard: ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Comma-separated Values (CSV) File Structure (2021); ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Sample ID and Metadata (Damerow et al. 2020)

File_Description: This file contains information about sampling sites and d50 estimates for YOLO,  the Networks with EXchange and Subsurface Storage (NEXSS) model, and the model in Abeshu et al. (2022; doi:10.5194/essd-14-929-2022). Details about methods can be found in the manuscript associated with this data package.
Standard: ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Comma-separated Values (CSV) File Structure (2021); ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Sample ID and Metadata (Damerow et al. 2020)

File_Description: This file contains information about d50 values extracted from a digitized version of Figure 2 in  Abeshu et al. (2022; doi:10.5194/essd-14-929-2022).
Standard: ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Comma-separated Values (CSV) File Structure (2021); ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Sample ID and Metadata (Damerow et al. 2020)

File_Description: Data dictionary that defines column headers across all csv files contained in the data package.
Standard: ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Comma-separated Values (CSV) File Structure (Velliquette et al. 2021)

File_Description: This file contains information about images used for YOLO d50 estimates, and YOLO model diagnostics.
Standard: ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Comma-separated Values (CSV) File Structure (2021); ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Sample ID and Metadata (Damerow et al. 2020)

File_Description: This file contains information about site characteristics used for correlation analyses.
Standard: ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Comma-separated Values (CSV) File Structure (2021); ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Sample ID and Metadata (Damerow et al. 2020)

File_Description: This file contains spatial information about sampling sites.
Standard: ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Comma-separated Values (CSV) File Structure (2021); ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Sample ID and Metadata (Damerow et al. 2020)

File_Description: This file contains estimates of d50 for sampling sites based on NEXSS and Abeshu et al. (2022; doi:10.5194/essd-14-929-2022) modeling approaches.
Standard: ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Comma-separated Values (CSV) File Structure (2021); ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Sample ID and Metadata (Damerow et al. 2020)

File_Description: This file contains information about sampling sites.
Standard: ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Comma-separated Values (CSV) File Structure (2021); ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Sample ID and Metadata (Damerow et al. 2020)

File_Description: File-level metadata that lists and describes all of the files contained in the data package.
Standard: ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for Comma-separated Values (CSV) File Structure (Velliquette et al. 2021); ESS-DIVE Reporting Format for File-level Metadata (Velliquette et al. 2021)

File_Description: File used to test YOLO model. Each file represents the model output for a given photo from a given site. The asterisk refers to the site ID, date, and an indicator to differentiate photos taken at the same site and date. PNNL_* represents the Hanford site included in the model. construction. Please see our publication for additional information on sites used.

File used to test YOLO model. Each file represents the model output for a given photo from a given site. The asterisk refers to the site ID, date, and an indicator to differentiate photos taken at the same site and date. PNNL_* represents the Hanford site included in the model. construction. Please see our publication for additional information on sites used.
